channel.title: Client Error [ All Clients ]
channel.description:
Can anyone help me solve this I got windows 7 starter and every single client+source I download I get this error when i run the batch file of the client, I have tryed to change the code in the batch file its always the same. What should I do to fix it ? I have tryed everything. Thanks In Advance.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Client Error [ All Clients ]
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

Never Mind its fixed all i had to do is change the batch file code little bit if any1 wants to give it a shot if it would work for them here is a code :

@echo off Title Runescape "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .; Jframe 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error [ All Clients ]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You have to make sure the class is in the classpath as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error [ All Clients ]
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

I can read that, but Jframe is there in client files. -.- im not that dumb.

Read full topic
